package.name: enchant
package.summary: libenchant binder, support near all spelling tools
package.description: Enchant is a binder for libenchant. Libenchant provides a common API for many spell libraries: - aspell/pspell (intended to replace ispell) - hspell (hebrew) - ispell - myspell (OpenOffice project, mozilla) - uspell (primarily Yiddish, Hebrew, and Eastern European languages) A plugin system allows to add custom spell support. see www.abisource.com/enchant/
